official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Rolla, Mo., for airport purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of specified property conveyed to the city of Rolla, Missouri, for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Rolla, Mo., for airport purposes.
